---
title: "r-data-exploration"
format: html
---
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```
```{r}
ggpair_diam <- GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
ggpair_diam
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat, y = price)) + 
  geom_point()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) + 
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = clarity, 
                            y = price)) + 
  geom_boxplot()
```
